quote: Two people can illustrate crudity to you.The first is the crude man, whom you see perceiving the diamond as a stone.The other is the refined man, who makes clear to you the crudity of the first one.
quote_letters: TWO PEOPLE CAN ILLUSTRATE CRUDITY TO YOUTHE FIRST IS THE CRUDE MAN WHOM YOU SEE PERCEIVING THE DIAMOND AS A STONETHE OTHER IS THE REFINED MAN WHO MAKES CLEAR TO YOU THE CRUDITY OF THE FIRST ONE
